extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">hdf, hdfeos, he2, he4</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: Hierarchical Data Format - Earth Observing System (HDF-EOS), based on HDF Version 4
description: HDF-EOS (Hierarchical Data Format (v4) - Earth Observing System) is a self-describing file format for transfer of various types of data between different machines.  HDF-EOS is implemented through a software extension to the HDF4 software library.
